Text: Is that the end of your report?

Y-Yes, Princess Iris. We'll continue our search to
the best of our abilities.
You may go now.
Iris nods, cuing him to take his leave.

When the door shuts closed behind him, Iris is left
alone with a handsome man with blond hair.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Marquess Zenon. Thank you for your cooperation.

Please don't thank me, Princess Iris. The incident
took place on school grounds. I was responsible for
keeping her safe, and more importantly, I'm worried
about her well-being...

He lowers his eyes and bites his lower lip in
frustration.

No one blames you. Right now, we need to focus on
getting Alexia back safe and sound.
Yes...the priority is your younger sister.
Another thing.

It seems that this Cid Kagenou is most likely the
perpetrator...

Based on the circumstances, I have to say I find him
suspicious.

Though I don't think he's strong enough to overpower
Alexia in a duel.

Which means he either had an accomplice or he
drugged her.
Zenon carefully chooses his words.

But he didn't crack during interrogation. Do you
really think it's him?

Five days of interrogation, and he didn't crack.
However, we've continued surveilling him after
his release.

It's a necessary precaution until we can be sure.
But I want to believe him.
Iris nods and narrows her eyes.

I also dislike suspecting one of my sister's
classmates.

Let's wait for the next report before we decide what
to do with him.
That said...
Yes?

My sister's been kidnapped, yet I lack the knights at
my command to do anything about it...

Everyone knows your strength far surpasses that of
the average knight, but, as a princess, you may also
be a target.

Those in the upper echelons must consider me a pain
to handle.

I understand how you feel. If there's anything I can
do to be of assistance, just let me know.

Then, by all means, help us maintain order here in
the Academy.

We've ensured all students are grounded and required
to remain in their dorms outside their classes.
Out of my way!
Please, Claire! Calm down!
How am I supposed to stay calm?!
I need to save Cid... I need to save my brother!

No matter your reason, as student president, I forbid
you from leaving the premises.

My weakling brother isn't capable of kidnapping
anyone! I'm sure the Knight Order knows this!
Enough.
Owwww!
I'm putting you in detention for the time being.
Let go of me! Owww!
There appear to be some exceptions...
I'll entrust the safety of the students to you.
As you wish.
Zenon bows and exits.

For her brother, huh? We feel the same way about our
respective families...
Iris murmurs.
The two sisters used to be close,

but somewhere along the way, they started drifting
apart.
In fact, they haven't spoken in years.
Iris knows they may never again.
When was the last time we spoke?
Alexia...

Iris shuts her wine-red eyes and lets a single tear
trail down her face.

I was interrogated in a room comparable to a
detention cell and released after five days. It's
evening now.
Go on. Scram.

They shove me out of the building and chuck my
stuff behind me.

I'm in nothing but my underwear, and I rummage
through my things to change and put on shoes. It
takes me a while to get dressed since all my
fingernails were ripped off.

When I get everything on, I heave out a big sigh and
start walking. I stand out among the people on the
busy street since I'm beaten up and drenched in
my own blood.

I let out another long exhale, and my field of vision
clears.

(I could heal my wounds instantaneously. But I don't,
because I'm fully immersed in acting out my role as a
nobody.)

I pay attention to my surroundings and sense strange
shadows lurking behind me.
Two of them are tailing me.

The kidnapper hasn't been caught which obviously
means that the state of Alexia's well-being is up in
the air. Just because I've been released doesn't
mean it's all sunshine and roses.

They just don't have enough evidence to convict me,
and my name hasn't been cleared yet.

I trudge back to my dorm room, pretending to hang my
head from exhaustion when—
Later...

A whisper reaches my ears, accompanied with the faint
scent of a familiar perfume.
Alpha...?
Returning to the dorm, I head to my room.
//ムービー再生

(I'm sure the girls are going about living their own
lives, but they're still keeping up pretenses—for me.
What a great bunch.
Ahhh! I'm alive again.
Hey, at least change out of your clothes.
Can't. Gonna go to bed now.

Don't you know the position you're in? They're going
to think you're the culprit if you don't do something.

True that. An unassuming student from a poor noble
family is the perfect target.
Alpha lets out a frustrated sigh.

(If the real culprit is never found, I can almost
guarantee the next suspect in line will be
punished.)

(Especially since this involves the kidnapping of a
royal. Someone has to die or else the case will
never be closed.)
(You gotta love the Middle Ages.)
We can't trust the Knight Order.
Has the Cult infiltrated them?

Yes, without a doubt. The abductor is a member of the
Cult. Their goal is to obtain high concentrations of
the "blood of the heroes."
Is she still alive?

If she dies, they won't be able to extract any more
of her blood.
True.

Though I'm not sure why you decided to woo the
princess.
That's not how it happened.

I'm sure you have your reasons—reasons you can't tell
us.

I don't let out another peep and avert my eyes to
avoid her gaze.
I have no real reason, of course.

I understand. I know you're struggling with something
deep down in your heart.
How do I respond when that's totally not the case?
But I hope you can trust us even a little bit more.

If you told us about this earlier, it wouldn't have
gotten out of hand. Don't you agree?
Yeah.
Oh, well.
She adds with a smile.

Once we solve this case, you're treating me to Tuna
King. That last sandwich was supposed to be mine.
Of course. Sorry for stealing your sandwich, Alpha.
Don't worry about it.
Lay low for a while. I'll send word when we're ready.
By the way... You mind if I eliminate
those two men who interrogated you?

Why? They were just doing their job. If anything,
they deserve compensation.

Compensation... Well, let me know if you change your
mind. Delta's here too, after all.

Once she gets the window open, she hooks one foot out
of the room, wiggling her tiny hips.
Delta's here?

(Gunshot Delta. Otherwise known as Suicide Weapon
Delta. Put simply, she's a blockhead who's spent all
her experience points on her battle skills.)

(A little reunion would be nice, I guess. I'm begging
that all of them turned out all right.)
She wants to see you.

I'll let you know the details when the preparations
are complete. See you soon.
Alpha flashes me a final smile.

Then she yanks on her bodysuit to hide her face and
slips out the window into the night.
